categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: Labyrinth des Bösen is an original German-language audio drama adaptation of Labyrinth of Evil. It is a full-cast scripted audio play based on the German version of the novel, similar to the English-language radio drama versions of the original trilogy. The CDs were released by WortArt in 2006-2007 as part of a two-set series, along with Dark Lord, adapting James Luceno's novels that follow Anakin Skywalker/Darth Vader immediately before and after the events of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.
